title: День секретных проектов
overview: Global conspiracies, secret research, forbidden predictions and technologies of the future - in special half-hour digest projects from the most knowledgeable presenters of the TV channel. Who wants to feed humanity with mutant meat and oil cabbage? How not to "get hooked" on the cult of consumption? Where do financial pyramids come from in social networks - and is there salvation from them? What is the danger of ... hygiene? How great is the power of hypnosis? How much would car dealership customers save if they paid only for what they really need? What rights does Turkey claim to Antarctica? And when will mushrooms and deep-sea monsters take over the planet?
